questions.question: What major performance upgrade did Base announce in Q4 2024?
questions.sourceCast: Base is testing Flashblocks to reduce tx times from 2s to 200ms.
questions.explanation: Base announced Flashblocks technology to dramatically reduce transaction processing times from 2 seconds to just 200 milliseconds.

questions.question: Which blockchain did Base recently launch a cross-chain bridge with?
questions.sourceCast: Base-Solana bridge now live using Chainlink CCIP
questions.explanation: Base launched a mainnet cross-chain bridge with Solana using Chainlink CCIP technology.

questions.question: What is Base's ultimate transaction speed goal?
questions.sourceCast: Base roadmap targets 1M TPS with fees under $0.01
questions.explanation: Base aims to achieve 1 million transactions per second while keeping fees consistently under $0.01.

questions.question: What is the primary category of the Base ecosystem on the Base Build platform?
questions.sourceCast: Base focuses on bringing billions onchain
questions.explanation: Base focuses on expanding the on-chain economy and bringing the next billion users onchain.

questions.question: Which company backs the Base blockchain?
questions.explanation: Base is an Ethereum Layer 2 solution developed and backed by Coinbase.
